name: SCContentFilter
desc: An object that filters the content a stream captures.

items.name: init(desktopIndependentWindow: SCWindow)
items.desc: Creates a filter that captures only the specified window.

items.name: init(display: SCDisplay, including: [SCWindow])
items.desc: Creates a filter that captures only specific windows from a display.

items.name: init(display: SCDisplay, excludingWindows: [SCWindow])
items.desc: Creates a filter that captures the contents of a display, excluding the specified windows.

items.name: init(display: SCDisplay, including: [SCRunningApplication], exceptingWindows: [SCWindow])
items.desc: Creates a filter that captures a display, including only windows of the specified apps.

items.name: init(display: SCDisplay, excludingApplications: [SCRunningApplication], exceptingWindows: [SCWindow])
items.desc: Creates a filter that captures a display, excluding windows of the specified apps.
